sections.text: account; distribution.Within thirty days after the decision of the arbitration board, the funds and investments in the escrow account established pursuant to section 70-1305, together with the interest thereon, shall be distributed or apportioned in accordance with the decision of the arbitration board.SourceLaws 1979, LB 207, ยง 22.

70-1322.Escrow account; distribution.

Within thirty days after the decision of the arbitration board, the funds and investments in the escrow account established pursuant to section 70-1305, together with the interest thereon, shall be distributed or apportioned in accordance with the decision of the arbitration board.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 207, ยง 22.
